id: The Muqaddimah An Introduction to History  Abd Ar-Rahman ibn Khaldun.pdf
title: The Muqaddimah: An Introduction to History
author: Abd Ar-Rahman ibn Khaldun
description: The Muqaddimah is a seminal work in the field of history and sociology by the renowned Arab historian Abd Ar-Rahman ibn Khaldun. It explores the principles of historical writing and provides an analytical framework for understanding the rise and fall of civilizations.
